description: Test suite for the LogViewer React component, verifying rendering of logs via SSE and API in different modes.

methods.name: test ('renders SSE messages when mode=logs')
methods.description: Verifies LogViewer renders SSE messages correctly in 'logs' mode.

methods.name: test ('renders batch log via api when mode=batch')
methods.description: Verifies LogViewer fetches and renders batch logs when mode is 'batch'.

methods.name: test ('renders fail log via api when mode=fail')
methods.description: Verifies LogViewer fetches and renders fail logs when mode is 'fail'.
